trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Pensacola
There were no other sightings in Pensacola on or around November 14th 2007
Summary: Disappearing and reappearing lights with fire trail
divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed what looked like an aircraft on fire in eastern sky over runway 17 at pensacola airport. Orange corkscrew pattern disappeared and then orange light appeared then disappeared and same light appeared in a lower position in sky further than it should have been able to travel and disappeared. It moved in a pattern like an L that was slightly elongated and tilted. It repeated this pattern. Pensacola Tower and Pensacola Fire and rescue also saw and reported lights. I tried to get my cell phone camera but the corkscrew fireball had disappeared. Then I saw the lights appear and disappear and I was stunned and just stared at the sky. This was like nothing I have ever seen and I can't explain what it was or how it would be able to move so fast and far
